title: Bright Nights display at Stanley Park
caption: Bright Nights display at Stanley Park
desc: If you’re looking to indulge in some festive fun, Vancouver’s Bright Nights Train event at Stanley Park is taking place between Nov. 28th until Jan. 1st. This year marks the 22nd edition and has earned the reputation of being the most popular Christmas attraction in western Canada. Visitors can get tickets to ride a miniature train that features live performances with a spectacular display of lights along the route. To keep yourself cozy, we highly recommend getting a hot chocolate before boarding the train.
